testcase.description:
Topology to use Topo4 Description Port forwarding for udp (tftp, telnet,RTP/RTSP….) Platform Dependence BR100,BR200,BRAP330,BRAP350 Pre-condition 1. Wan interface eth0 get ip on br 2. Nat enable on wan interface 3. Pc1 connect to br lan interface and get lan subnet ip address and enable tftp server on pc1 4. Pc2 connect to external network on br and pc2 can reach br wan interface Test procedure 1. Configure 1 port forwarding nat policy for tftp udp on br ip nat-policy tftp type virtual-host inside-host 192.168.1.11 inside-port 69 outside-port 3100 protocol udp
2. apply the port forwarding nat policy on wan interface interface eth0 mode wan nat-policy tftp
3. pc2 send udp port 3100 connection to eth0 ip address of br, check result1 4. no the port forwarding on wan interface eth0 , check result 2 no interface eth0 mode wan nat-policy tftp
5. pc2 send udp port 3100 connection to eth0 ip address of br, again, check result 3 Expect result 1. pc2 connect to pc1 tftp server and can upload and download file through tftp 2. the tftp connection is disconnected on pc2 3. pc2 can’t connect to pc1 tftp server and can’t upload and download file through tftp----?pass

step.desc: configure mgt0.1 with dhcp service enable
step.telnet: -v "vlan ${br1.vpc1.vlan}" -v "interface vlan ${br1.vpc1.vlan}" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} ip ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}/${br.lan.netmask}" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} dhcp-server ip-pool ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_start} ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_end}" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} dhcp-server options netmask ${br.route.netmask}" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} dhcp-server options default-gateway ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} dhcp-server options dns1 ${pub.dns1.ip}" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} dhcp-server enable"

-v "user-profile auto1" -v "user-profile auto1 vlan-id ${br1.vlan1} attribute 1" -v "security-object lan1" -v "security-object lan1 default-user-profile-attr 1" -v "interface ${br1.br.lan.int1} switchport mode access " -v "interface ${br1.br.lan.int1} switchport user-profile-attribute 1 "

step.desc: set br1.vpc1.tif.ip var for vpc1 on BR side
1. Configure 1 port forwarding nat policy for tftp udp on br
step.telnet: -v "ip nat-policy auto${job.id} type virtual-host inside-host ${br1.vpc1.tif.ip} inside-port 69 outside-port 69 protocol udp" -v "interface ${br1.br.wan.int1} mode wan nat-policy auto${job.id}"
-v "show ip nat-policy auto${job.id}" -v "_ff id 1 dst-ip ${br1.br.wan.ip} dst-port 69 bidirectional" -v "_kdebug fe basic" -v "_kdebug fe detail"

step.desc: pc2 send udp port 69 connection to eth0 ip address of br,tftp should be successful
check the file on br.vpc1,the file is tftp send to br.vpc1 from external pc
no the port forwarding on wan interface eth0
step.telnet: -v "no interface ${br1.br.wan.int1} mode wan nat-policy auto${job.id}" -v "show ip nat-policy auto${job.id}"

step.desc: pc2 send udp port 69 connection to eth0 ip address of br,tftp should be failed
